    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1074</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Who Invented It and When?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wer erfand sie und als?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Qui l'a inventée et quand ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quem a inventou e quando?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chi la ha inventata e quando?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιος τον έφηυρε και όταν;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Quién la inventó y cuando?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners will learn about inventors and their various inventions, some of which we use every day.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interactive activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">inventions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">quiz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">trivia game</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger erlernen über Erfinder und ihre verschiedenen 
Erfindungen, von denen einigen wir jeden Tag verwenden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants se renseigneront sur les inventeurs et 
leurs diverses inventions, dont certaines nous utilisons chaque jour.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners aprenderão sobre os inventores e suas várias
invenções, alguns de que nós usamos cada dia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti impareranno circa gli inventori e le loro 
varie invenzioni, alcuni di cui usiamo ogni giorno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι θα μάθουν για τους εφευρέτες και τις 
διάφορες εφευρέσεις τους, μερικοί από τους οποίους 
χρησιμοποιούμε κάθε ημέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los principiantes aprenderán sobre los inventores y sus 
varias invenciones, algunos de quienes utilizamos cada día.</string>
          </description>
